[![](https://i2.wp.com/www.onemanandhisblog.com/content/images/2007/05/509368325_d763a0190f.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/509368325/ "photo sharing") [Seagull](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/509368325/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
I’m back from my holiday in Cornwall, where I photographed this chap in the town of Polperro. I’m off to Dublin on business pretty much straight away, so it may be a couple of days before I pick up posting steam here again.
